name: Breaking Rat
description:
Breed animals living in a sewer and create weird looking abominations.
Send your creations to the fight club to level up your animals and receive special power-ups and gain experience to become the strongest fighter in the sewer! 

Drag and drop your animals on top of each other to breed them.
Send one of your creations with just one click to the fight club to become stronger and unlock new animal types!

    

This game was made in 4 days during a game jam hosted by our university classmates and was developed by a team of 3 called:

Samuel Knüsel – Programming
Luca Imesch – Programming
Dana Senn – Visuals


Additional Music by
Eric Matyas: www.soundimage.org
